answer: C: Event 10 sub-event: Discussion of JWST dedicating significant observing time to the seven TRAPPIST-1 planets, including the possibility of finding the first signs of life.

The segment at event 10 mentions the possibility of finding the first signs of life on the TRAPPIST-1 planets, which is a direct thematic shift towards life-focused content. This aligns with the hosts' preview of their next episode about "weird life on other worlds." The other options either discuss habitability in general (Event 3) or focus on the TRAPPIST-1 system but don't specifically mention the possibility of finding life.
